001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.common;
003
004import java.math.BigDecimal;
005import java.math.RoundingMode;
006import java.util.Objects;
007import java.util.Optional;
008
009import javax.money.*;
010import javax.money.Monetary;
011
012import com.commercetools.money.MonetaryProvider;
013import com.commercetools.money.MonetarySupplier;
014
015import org.javamoney.moneta.spi.DefaultRoundingProvider;
016
017public class MoneyUtil {
018    private static final MonetaryProvider MONETARY_PROVIDER;
019    protected static final DefaultRoundingProvider ROUNDING_PROVIDER = new DefaultRoundingProvider();
020
021    static {
022        MONETARY_PROVIDER = MonetarySupplier.instance();
023    }
024
025    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final Money money) {
026        if (money instanceof TypedMoneyDraft) {
027            return toMonetaryAmount((TypedMoneyDraft) money);
028        }
029        if (money instanceof TypedMoney) {
030            return toMonetaryAmount((TypedMoney) money);
031        }
032        return MONETARY_PROVIDER.asMonetaryAmount(money.getCentAmount(), Monetary.getCurrency(money.getCurrencyCode()));
033    }
034
035    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final TypedMoneyDraft money) {
036        if (money instanceof HighPrecisionMoneyDraft) {
037            return toMonetaryAmount((HighPrecisionMoneyDraft) money);
038        }
039        return toMonetaryAmount((CentPrecisionMoneyDraft) money);
040    }
041
042    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final CentPrecisionMoneyDraft money) {
043        CurrencyUnit unit = Monetary.getCurrency(money.getCurrencyCode());
044        return MONETARY_PROVIDER.asMonetaryAmount(money.getCentAmount(),
045            Optional.ofNullable(money.getFractionDigits()).orElse(unit.getDefaultFractionDigits()), unit);
046    }
047
048    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final HighPrecisionMoneyDraft money) {
049        CurrencyUnit unit = Monetary.getCurrency(money.getCurrencyCode());
050        return MONETARY_PROVIDER.asMonetaryAmount(money.getPreciseAmount(), money.getFractionDigits(), unit);
051    }
052
053    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final TypedMoney money) {
054        if (money instanceof HighPrecisionMoney) {
055            return toMonetaryAmount((HighPrecisionMoney) money);
056        }
057        return toMonetaryAmount((CentPrecisionMoney) money);
058    }
059
060    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final CentPrecisionMoney money) {
061        CurrencyUnit unit = Monetary.getCurrency(money.getCurrencyCode());
062        return MONETARY_PROVIDER.asMonetaryAmount(money.getCentAmount(),
063            Optional.ofNullable(money.getFractionDigits()).orElse(unit.getDefaultFractionDigits()), unit);
064    }
065
066    public static MonetaryAmount toMonetaryAmount(final HighPrecisionMoney money) {
067        CurrencyUnit unit = Monetary.getCurrency(money.getCurrencyCode());
068        return MONETARY_PROVIDER.asMonetaryAmount(money.getPreciseAmount(), money.getFractionDigits(), unit);
069    }
070
071    public static MonetaryAmount zeroAmount(final String currency) {
072        return zeroAmount(Monetary.getCurrency(currency));
073    }
074
075    public static MonetaryAmount zeroAmount(final CurrencyUnit currency) {
076        return MONETARY_PROVIDER.asMonetaryAmount(0, currency);
077    }
078
079    public static CentPrecisionMoney of(final MonetaryAmount monetaryAmount) {
080        return CentPrecisionMoneyBuilder.of()
081                .centAmount(amountToCents(monetaryAmount))
082                .fractionDigits(monetaryAmount.getCurrency().getDefaultFractionDigits())
083                .currencyCode(monetaryAmount.getCurrency().getCurrencyCode())
084                .build();
085    }
086
087    public static HighPrecisionMoney of(final MonetaryAmount monetaryAmount, final int fractionDigits) {
088        return HighPrecisionMoneyBuilder.of()
089                .centAmount(amountToCents(monetaryAmount))
090                .preciseAmount(amountToPreciseAmount(monetaryAmount, fractionDigits))
091                .fractionDigits(fractionDigits)
092                .currencyCode(monetaryAmount.getCurrency().getCurrencyCode())
093                .build();
094    }
095
096    public static CentPrecisionMoneyDraft draftOf(final MonetaryAmount monetaryAmount) {
097        return CentPrecisionMoneyDraftBuilder.of()
098                .centAmount(amountToCents(monetaryAmount))
099                .currencyCode(monetaryAmount.getCurrency().getCurrencyCode())
100                .build();
101    }
102
103    public static HighPrecisionMoneyDraft draftOf(final MonetaryAmount monetaryAmount, final int fractionDigits) {
104        return HighPrecisionMoneyDraftBuilder.of()
105                .centAmount(amountToCents(monetaryAmount))
106                .preciseAmount(amountToPreciseAmount(monetaryAmount, fractionDigits))
107                .fractionDigits(fractionDigits)
108                .currencyCode(monetaryAmount.getCurrency().getCurrencyCode())
109                .build();
110    }
111
112    public static long amountToCents(final MonetaryAmount monetaryAmount) {
113        final MonetaryRounding ROUNDING = ROUNDING_PROVIDER.getRounding(
114            RoundingQueryBuilder.of().setRoundingName("default").setCurrency(monetaryAmount.getCurrency()).build());
115        return monetaryAmount.with(ROUNDING).query(amount -> queryFrom(monetaryAmount).longValue());
116    }
117
118    public static long amountToPreciseAmount(final MonetaryAmount monetaryAmount, final int fractionDigits) {
119        final MonetaryRounding ROUNDING = ROUNDING_PROVIDER.getRounding(
120            RoundingQueryBuilder.of().setRoundingName("default").setCurrency(monetaryAmount.getCurrency()).build());
121        return monetaryAmount.with(ROUNDING).query(amount -> queryFrom(monetaryAmount, fractionDigits).longValue());
122    }
123
124    protected static BigDecimal queryFrom(final MonetaryAmount amount) {
125        Objects.requireNonNull(amount, "Amount required.");
126        BigDecimal number = amount.getNumber().numberValue(BigDecimal.class);
127        CurrencyUnit cur = amount.getCurrency();
128        number = number.setScale(Math.max(0, cur.getDefaultFractionDigits()), RoundingMode.HALF_EVEN);
129        return number.movePointRight(number.scale());
130    }
131
132    protected static BigDecimal queryFrom(final MonetaryAmount amount, final int fractionsDigit) {
133        Objects.requireNonNull(amount, "Amount required.");
134        BigDecimal number = amount.getNumber().numberValue(BigDecimal.class);
135        number = number.setScale(fractionsDigit, RoundingMode.HALF_EVEN);
136        return number.movePointRight(number.scale());
137    }
138}
